001package com.technototes.vision.hardware;
002
003import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.hardware.camera.WebcamName;
004
005import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCameraFactory;
006import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvWebcam;
007
008public class Webcam extends Camera<OpenCvWebcam, WebcamName> {
009
010    public Webcam(WebcamName device) {
011        super(device);
012    }
013
014    public Webcam(String device) {
015        super(device);
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public OpenCvWebcam createCamera() {
020        return OpenCvCameraFactory.getInstance()
021                .createWebcam(
022                        getDevice(),
023                        hardwareMap
024                                .appContext
025                                .getResources()
026                                .getIdentifier("cameraMonitorViewId", "id", hardwareMap.appContext.getPackageName()));
027    }
028}
